topic.title: I've created an zeronet website for Elsword Offline
topic.body:
Elsword is action MMORPG, in 2019 KOG games just fucked up this game . Make this game broken so much so i decied to mod the elsword trial.
It's have Ruben Dungeon Season 1 , Elder Season 1, Besma Season 1 .
Feel free to access this website , you can ask me any question if you have trouble with it. Sorry for my bad english:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BqB5zeJh5ywRpBU98UmwN2uipsJ3GmWhF/

1551198702_1Z5fQoNhfFsKR9pC3AtFaYsEpVUVU.body:
> [gluek](#comment_11_1LsU5cS8D3qjVLzgdwtcfdXtHEY8T2Gixi): I'll help to seed it, but right now it's pretty big (20MB) site with nothing on front pages, you should consider to shrink it with optional files.

There are two website hidden inside the site, that's why it 20MB. But i will shrink it as soon as i can. Thank you for your response

> [60](#comment_10_1Ekf2tGQLhG3iifFsuUk9RcBPx26cQmCD1): good job! keep going, we need more of these on zeronetalso, you may shrink it first and then increase it because en public proxies ( https://0net.io fo example) zites larger than 10mb wont be seededand dont be sorry for your english, because though you speak english badly, people can still understang you (i speak english badly, tooðŸ˜…)

I don't want to get this website going to public, that's why i using zeronet to get rid of KOG warrior. But i've finish shrink it today. 
If you can, please help me seed Bloody Roar 2 Online website:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/17RuSUFB9dUjr8MGGrxwM6WvnbQnTTwUou/br2online/
